mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID ,A.JOIN_INFO ,B.NAME ,B.NICK_NAME ,B.EMAIL ,B.IMG_NAME ,B.RATING FROM T_MEMBER A JOIN T_MEMBER_DETAIL B ON A.USR_IDX = B.USR_IDX WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MEMBER_DETAIL( usr_idx, name, nick_name, phon_number, email, img_name, last_login ) VALUES ( (select usr_idx from T_MEMBER where(user_id=#{userId})), #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phonNumber}, #{email}, #{imgName}, now() );
